amendment.description: Amendment sought to reauthorize the FHA pilot program to establish an automated process for providing additional credit rating information to help determine creditworthiness for families with insufficient credit histories.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 12 printed in House Report 114-411 to reauthorize the FHA pilot program to establish an automated process for providing additional credit rating information to help determine creditworthiness for families with insufficient credit histories.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 239 (Roll no. 51).

action.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Green, Al.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
